page.title: 06THE SOCIAL CLUB
page.content: The Social Club is a club for adults and children.It is in Handcross High Street.It has over 800 members.There is a disco,a bar,a snooker room,a billiard table,pool and darts.It is where people meet socially.The disco is really for elevens and over but if you are a member you may go.The bar is for adults but children can buy soft drinks and food.To play snooker you must be a full member, younger children must have an adult with them.It opens at 11.30 a.m. On week days the social club closes at 3.00 p.m.It also has two fruit machines. There is a bar in the upstairs room where they hold the discos and other events.There is a snack bar downstairs where you can buy fish and chips,hamburgers,hot dogs,sausages and chicken.On Sundays you can buy a roast dinner.
